des: Wondering who made this and why? Well, here's your answer!

what.des: College life can be full of stress and anxiety. But it doesn't have to be! This page is the product of our cumulative effort to promote mental health awareness, and help you enjoy your life to the fullest.

who.des: Get to know the people behind the curtains. Want to learn content production? Interested in discussing student wellness? Or are you just grateful and want to say thanks? Contact us!

content.name: Thu Nguyen
content.des: Tee is a people supporter, a skincare enthusiast, and a firm believer in retail therapy!

content.name: Sunmisola Ojewumi
content.des: Sunmi can brighten up your day in just 5 minutes. She also has a knack for writing and video curation.

content.name: Trang Nguyen
content.des: Trang believes that we do well by doing good. Let's spread kindness and wisdom!

content.name: Vu Luong
content.des: Vu is an intentioned designer, a data enthusiast, and a shameless self-promoter.

content.name: Aakshi Sinha
content.des: Aakshi is an artist and a musician that wants to show the world how magical human beings can be.
